mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM NUM, FREE.* FROM ( SELECT IC.FREE_COMMENT_NO, IC.UNO, IC.FREE_BNO, IC.FREE_COMMENT_REPORTNO, IC.FREE_COMMENT_CONTENT, CASE WHEN IC.FREE_COMMENT_GROUP = 0 THEN IC.FREE_COMMENT_NO ELSE IC.FREE_COMMENT_GROUP END AS FREE_COMMENT_GROUP, IC.FREE_COMMENT_BLINDSTATE, IC.FREE_COMMENT_REGDATE, IC.FREE_COMMENT_UPDATE, U.NICKNAME FROM FREE_COMMENT IC JOIN FREEINFO U ON IC.UNO = U.UNO WHERE IC.FREE_BNO=#{freeBno} ORDER BY CASE WHEN IC.FREE_COMMENT_GROUP = 0 THEN IC.FREE_COMMENT_NO ELSE IC.FREE_COMMENT_GROUP END, IC.FREE_COMMENT_NO ) FREE ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_COMMENT (FREE_COMMENT_NO, FREE_BNO, UNO, FREE_COMMENT_CONTENT, FREE_COMMENT_GROUP, FREE_COMMENT_UPDATE_UNO) VALUES (FREE_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{freeBno}, #{uno}, #{freeCommentContent}, #{freeCommentGroup}, #{uno})
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_COMMENT SET FREE_COMMENT_BLINDSTATE = 2, FREE_COMMENT_UPDATE= SYSDATE, FREE_COMMENT_UPDATE_UNO = #{uno} WHERE FREE_COMMENT_NO = #{freeCommentNo} AND #{userStatus} = 1 AND FREE_COMMENT_BLINDSTATE = 1
UPDATE FREE_COMMENT SET FREE_COMMENT_REPORTNO = FREE_COMMENT_REPORTNO + 1 WHERE FREE_BNO = #{freeBno}
